name: authentik
tagline: An identity and access management platform for authentication and authorization
description: Authentik is a self-hosted identity provider and access management platform that supports OAuth 2.0, SAML, and LDAP. It targets enterprises and self-hosters looking for a keycloak alternative with modern UI.

features.title: Identity Provider
features.description: Complete authentication and access management. Enterprise-grade security

features.title: Oauth 2.0 & Saml
features.description: Support for modern authentication protocols. Standard compliance

features.title: Ldap Integration
features.description: Connect to existing directory infrastructure. Seamless migration

features.title: Modern Ui
features.description: Beautiful, intuitive administration interface. Easy management

features.title: Keycloak Alternative
features.description: Powerful alternative with better UX. Modern approach

features.title: Flow
features.description: Visual workflow designer for auth flows. Flexible configuration

features.title: Multi
features.description: Support multiple organizations from one instance. Scalable architecture

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over identity management. Data sovereignty
